name: Substandard Duplicator
desc: Picking up an item gives you a temporary copy of itself. Temporary items last an additional 10 (+10 per stack) seconds
notes:
The Substandard Duplicator is a returning item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Alloyed Collective expansion.
When the user picks up an item, they also gain a temporary version of the same item, and all temporary items last an additional 10 (+10 per stack) seconds.


== Notes ==
Items dropped by printers do not grant temporary copies.
This is because it could lead to infinite temp items if allowed.
Regular Items that are blacklisted from being temporary grant a random temporary of that tier instead.
 Regenerating Scrap,  Sale Star,  Prayer Beads are most notable.
WorldUnique and Quest items, that can't be temporary, simply do nothing on pickup.
Most notably;  Item Scrap, White
As all Lunars are blacklisted, they are unable to be rerolled into another.
However if one was added (through modding), they will be rerolled into that.


== Tips ==
This functions with  Sentry Key, allowing for half the normally necessary amount to be collected. Temporary stacks will be prioritized when they are consumed, meaning you can also save one for creating an  Exposed Cerebellum.


== Lore ==

A designer delight. Or so it would be if it worked like it should... Out of all my birthday presents this is what I was the happiest about, yet all its dupes are... Terrible! They don't last a minute without breaking apart. Can you help me out please?


== Version History ==
Alloyed Collective

Added New Item: Substandard Duplicator


== Trivia ==
The Substandard Duplicator is the first item from Risk of Rain Returns to be added to Risk of Rain 2. It is also the first returning item added by an expansion.
Unlike other returning items, the logbook entry for Substandard Duplicator is identical to its logbook entry in its original game.
